summary: Another in my line of \'Crests Mods\'
descriptionHtml:
Vlaanderan Family Coat of Arms:

Take a look at the screenshots, if you like it, download and endorse, if you dont, give me feed-back so i can fix the issues.

this Mod changes all Stormcloak Rebels and Windhelm Guards to carry the Vlaanderan Coat of Arms and colors. i have to admit that i cheated with this and only very slightly changed the color of a whiterun cuirass because the color scheme was already meant to be yellow/black, the only thing i had to put much effort into was the shield :D this was the best request ever!

so download if you like but most importantly give feed-back and/or endorse! its what gives me the will to continue with this project :)

Callaghan04

P.S.

as always, textures can be used as long as you ask my permission and give me credit. and requests are always welcome too.
author: Callaghan04
